topic.title: Access Web GUI
topic.shortdesc: You can enter the IP address of TA gateway in the Web browser to access the Web GUI.

body.p: The TA1600/2400/3200 attempts to access a DHCP server in your network to obtain valid network settings (e.g., the IP address, subnet mask, default gateway address, and DNS address) by default.Enable DHCP Server in your network to obtain the TA1600/2400/3200 IP address.

ol.li: Pick up the analog phone, then access the voice menu prompt by dialing ***.
Dial 1 to check the IP address.

body.section:
Access Web GUI
After entering the IP address in the Web browser, you will see a login page.
Check the default settings below.
Username: admin Password: password
